title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 451.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 451.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The Department of State Fire Academy Grants and Bequests

Account enables the public to contribute directly to the department and the

Office of Fire Prevention and Control for the support of fire training and
public education programs and improvements at the State Academy of Fire

Science. This Part establishes the procedures by which contributions may be
made to and by which expenditures may be made from this
account. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
451.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
